text: "It wasn't as perfect as I wanted it to be," Oprah said. She had envisioned the dollhouse to look like the treehouse Mindy's Wrinkle character, Mrs. Who, lives in. But Mindy disagreed by saying, "Now it only looks like a beautiful castle." To which Oprah replied, "It was the best I could do."
title: Oprah gave Mindy Kaling the most thoughtful baby gift EVER

og.title: Oprah gave Mindy Kaling the most thoughtful baby gift EVER - Today's Parent
og.description: Oprah gifted her new mom friend and 'A Wrinkle in Time' co-star, Mindy Kaling, the best gift. Here's a hint: It involves two men and a U-Haul truck.
